fullDescription.intro: This layer applies max pooling in a single dimension. Corresponds to the Keras Max Pooling 1D Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The step size of the pooling window in one dimension.
The size of the pooling window in one dimension.

Different padding modes to apply to the spatial dimensions (excluding the batch and channel dimensions) of the inputs before the pooling operation. The padding will be done with zeroes. A detailed explanation of the different modes can be found here.
Valid: No padding
Same: Padding such that the spatial output dimension do not change.
Full: Padding with kernel size - 1

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Max Pooling 1D layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Max Pooling 1D layer.
